description: The last 10 months were the driest July to April for southern England in records stretching back more than 100 years, figures reveal
title: Driest ten months in 100 years recorded in southern England

author: BBC Sport
description: England will begin their quest to win a third consecutive Six Nations title in Italy on Sunday, 4 February.
title: Six Nations 2018: England, Wales, Scotland, Ireland, France & Italy fixtures revealed

author: talkSPORT
description: England Under-17s beat Turkey 2-1 in Croatia to reach the UEFA U17 European Championship final on Friday. The Young Lions will face Germany or Spain in Varazdin as the 2010 and 2014 champions look to become the first nation to win the competition for a third time. Chelsea forward Callum Hudson-Odoi opened the scoring before Manchester City prospect Jadon Sancho bagged his fifth of the tournament. Turkey set up a nervy second half in Zapresic when Kerem Kesgin pulled one back on the stroke of half-time.
title: England Under-17s reach U17 European Championship final with 2-1 win over Turkey

author: Richard Innes
description: The official club photos from the launch of the new strip suggest the England midfielder may well be staying at Goodison Park
title: Everton drop hint over Ross Barkley future

author: BBC Sport
description: Australia's Ashes series against England could be in doubt because of a players' contract dispute, says vice-captain David Warner.
title: David Warner: Australia vice-captain has concerns over contract dispute

author: BBC News
description: Scrapping tuition fees in England, limiting class sizes and extending free childcare to all two-year-olds.
title: Labour manifesto pledges £25bn package for education

author: James Whaling
description: The England hitman pays £50 a day for his fuel for goals provided by Nourish Fit Food
title: Marcus Rashford's extraordinary diet... delivered to his doorstep

author: ESPNcricinfo staff
description: India will tour the West Indies for five ODIs and one T20 international in June and July, with the trip beginning almost immediately after the Champions Trophy final in England.
title: India to tour West Indies right after Champions Trophy

author: Firdose Moonda
description: South Africa are set for a long tour of England, by the end of which they could have the ICC Champions Trophy and an improved chance at taking the No. 1 Test ranking
title: South Africa depart on a long journey chasing trophies

author: ESPNcricinfo staff
description: Chris Woakes insists he'll be fit and ready to resume his international duties for England against South Africa next week, despite coming off the back of a draining maiden stint in the IPL
title: Woakes ready to take IPL form into Champions Trophy
